name: fission for iFox.
description:
At the same time we use "iFox series" and "Fission", the following problems occur.

1)We can't see the progress bar.
2)The location bar's boder, top and bottom, filled with gray.

This style will fix those problems.

Notes:
All iFox Series with Firefox3.x

Update info:2009/03/08 12:30(Japan time)
Fix progress bar's starting position.
